item.title: 周一，立法者将在凡尔赛宫举行议会联席会议，对一项将妇女堕胎权写入法国宪法的法案进行历史性的表决。
item.description:

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 克里斯-莫滕森（Chris Mortensen）是一位屡获殊荣的记者，曾为 ESPN 报道美国橄榄球联盟（NFL）三十多年，据他的家人说，他于周日上午去世。享年 72 岁。
item.description:
Chris Mortensen, an award-winning journalist who reported on the NFL for ESPN for more than three decades, died Sunday morning, according to his family. He was 72. https://t.co/L0GcuakX79 pic.twitter.com/EtbEQ284Yu

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 对于经常购买《无畏传单》中介绍的食品的人来说，Trader Joe's（乔氏超市）召回了一款广受欢迎的冷冻食品，您的冰箱里可能就有这种食品。
item.description:
To anyone who stocks up on grocery items featured in the Fearless Flyer, Trader Joe's has recalled one of its popular frozen food items, which may be in your freezer. https://t.co/jbDXbWl5vt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 英国警方称，他们已经找回了 1995 年从奥地利一级方程式车手格哈德-伯杰（Gerhard Berger）那里失窃的一辆法拉利跑车。
item.description:
A very fast car has made a very slow return.

British police say they have recovered a Ferrari that was stolen from Austrian Formula One driver Gerhard Berger — in 1995. https://t.co/kWLNTItuw8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：捷蓝航空（JetBlue）和精神航空（Spirit Airlines）在法院裁决阻止其 38 亿美元的合并计划后，将终止合并。
item.description:
BREAKING: JetBlue and Spirit Airlines are ending their proposed $3.8 billion merger after a court ruling blocked the deal. https://t.co/XG7gbvJ7R1

item.description:

item.title: 这位网络红人名叫 Reesa Teesa，是现在流行的 "我嫁给了谁 "TikTok 系列中的一员，她接受了 @RobinRoberts 的独家专访，详细讲述了她与一个男人的婚姻故事，她声称这个男人对她生活中几乎所有的细节都撒了谎。
item.description:
The internet sensation known as Reesa Teesa, of the now-viral "Who TF Did I Marry" TikTok series, sat down with @RobinRoberts for an exclusive interview detailing her story of marriage to a man she alleges lied about nearly every detail of his life. https://t.co/hyZ2YTyjhD

item.title: 加利福尼亚州内华达山脉本季最大的暴风雪已于一夜之间结束，但对某些地区来说，更多的雪还在路上。
item.description:

item.title: 消息人士告诉 @ABC News，前特朗普组织首席财务官艾伦-韦塞尔伯格（Allen Weisselberg）周一将承认与他在前总统特朗普民事欺诈案审判期间的证词有关的伪证指控：
item.description:
Ex-Trump Organization CFO Allen Weisselberg will plead guilty Monday to perjury charges related to his testimony during former Pres. Trump’s civil fraud trial, sources tell @ABC News.

Read more: https://t.co/494wsTeEKH pic.twitter.com/rOnHrfsBOz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 马来西亚政府官员周日表示，在一家私营公司就指向波音777客机位置的潜在新证据与他们接触后，他们对恢复马来西亚航空公司MH370客机的搜寻持开放态度。
item.description:
Government officials in Malaysia said on Sunday they'd be open to resuming the search for Malaysian Airlines MH370 after a private company approached them about potential new evidence pointing to the location of the Boeing 777. https://t.co/AydVbevKe5

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在武装团伙袭击了这个加勒比国家最大的两所监狱并释放了数十名囚犯之后，海地进入了紧急状态并实行夜间宵禁，暴力事件激增。

item.title: 新消息：欧盟对苹果公司处以近 20 亿美元的罚款，原因是苹果公司不公平地偏袒自己的音乐流媒体服务，从而违反了欧盟的竞争法。
item.description:
NEW: European Union fines Apple nearly $2 billion for breaking the bloc's competition laws by unfairly favoring its own music streaming service over rivals. https://t.co/lJFiHvVDnF

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 根据国土安全部发布的最新简报备忘录，在文化战争中，医疗保健领域目标受到的威胁可能会持续 "升高"。
item.description:

item.title: 造船工人将类似汽车的飞行器弹射到弗吉尼亚州的詹姆斯河中，以此测试美国海军飞机的发射系统。
item.description:
Shipbuilders test a launch system for U.S. Navy aircraft by catapulting car-like vehicles into the James River in Virginia.

The cars are retrieved and relaunched to continue testing the electromagnetic aircraft launch system. pic.twitter.com/cfpyarTsah

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 召回警报：据美国监管机构称，乔氏超市（Trader Joe's）销售的61,000多磅蒸鸡汤饺因可能含有硬塑料而被召回。

item.title: 最高法院表示，周一将就各州根据第 14 修正案第 3 条将前总统唐纳德-特朗普从选票中删除的能力发表一份或多份意见。
item.description:
The Supreme Court says it will release one or more opinions on Monday over states' ability to remove former President Donald Trump from the ballot under Section 3 of the 14th Amendment.https://t.co/KPweVfmu9y

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 警方称，一群戴着 "深色面具 "的枪手在加利福尼亚州国王城一栋房子的派对外开火，造成 4 人死亡。

item.title: 在纪念阿拉巴马州塞尔玛 "血色星期天 "59 周年之际，副总统哈里斯说，加沙 "巨大的苦难规模 "要求 "至少在未来六周内 "暂时停火。
item.description:

item.title: 哈佛大学最近的一项研究显示，房租成本造成的负担比以往任何时候都重，这正式反映了全国租房者面临的严峻现实。
item.description:
More Americans are burdened by the cost of rent than ever before, according to a recent Harvard study, officially capturing the grim reality facing renters nationwide. https://t.co/ZyTSGzSMQD

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 在举家准备出发去春游的时候，一段关于一名妇女在飞机上争夺窗帘的新视频引发了关于旅客舒适度和礼貌的新问题。
item.description:
As families get set to take off for spring break, a new video of a woman battling over a window shade on a plane has sparked a new question about comfort and courtesy for travelers. https://t.co/6wTndLL6mP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024

item.title: 美国食品及药物管理局宣布，某些含有全氟和多氟烷基物质（或称 PFAS）的防油脂材料 "在美国不再出售用于食品包装"。
item.description:
Certain grease-proofing materials containing per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances, or PFAS, "are no longer being sold for use in food packaging in the U.S," the FDA announced. https://t.co/HliOxBb80j

— ABC News (@ABC) March 4, 2024
